Text: They fled from the Sanctuary into the forest.
Alexia, Rose, and Natsume walk together.
That scenery we saw... Could that've been Shadow's?
Alexia...?
Alexia stops.
Is something wrong?
Rose and Natsume stop to look at Alexia.
Hey, don't you hate it?
Hate what...?
I'm not sure I get what you mean.

We couldn't do a thing. It was like a show of just
how powerless we are.

But that's not all. We were just useless bystanders,
unable to tell who's right or wrong or even who's
good or evil...
Alexia...

If we keep on like this, kept in the dark, we're
going to lose everything we hold dear.
I just know it...
I...also have something on my mind.

Ever since the attack on the academy, great forces
have been at work behind the scenes.

We know nothing of the Shadow Garden or the
ones they are at war with...

So what do you intend to do about all this, Princess
Alexia Midgar?

We're weak and clueless. But together, the three of
us may be able to do something.

I'm a princess of Midgar, and Rose is likewise the
princess of Oriana.

And even you, Natsume Kafka, have your personal
network as an author.

We'll start by pooling our efforts to gather
information.
And what will we do with this information?

That depends on what we find, but I feel that as a
trio we may be able to make a difference.

We can recruit more to our side, secure a base of
operations... Or maybe we don't need one.
And all without a shred of realism.

Th-That's why I said we'd start with gathering
information and then decide our next move
after we consider our findings!
Natsume's critical comment earns her a glare.
If you're even smart enough to do all that...
Natsume mutters under her breath.
Did you say something?
No, nothing.

The two eye each other for a moment, Natsume with a
smile, Alexia with a glower.
So what will it be? Do we do this, or no?
I'm in.
Though few, I do have some connections.
Rose is the first to extend her hand.

I'll see what I can uncover using my connections as
an author as well.
Natsume then places her hand on Rose's.

So it's decided. From this moment forth, we're
allies.

Though we hail from different nations and standings,
and though some of our motives may be less certain
than others...
I truly believe we are in this together.

An alliance seeking to expose the truth of the
world—I like that. It feels like the birth of a
legend.
Rose smiles.
We have our hero, our scholar...and our dead weight.

Natsume cheerily looks at Alexia upon uttering the
final role.
You speak of yourself, I assume.
Alexia gives Natsume an equally cheery look.

The morning sun shines down upon the city of Lindwurm
in the distance.
